thread.section_title: Four Seasons Hotel Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superior Service
thread.title_full: Superior Service - Review of Four Seasons Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: JCFoodLover
title: Superior Service
text:
Superior service from start to finish. Excellent breakfast buffet. Enjoyed cocktails at the bar. Our bartender Erren was excellent. The Cherry Old Fashion was delicious and well balanced.
The Spa was also exceptional! Great spa amenities before your treatment. Service was over the top!
The rooms are spacious and have ever amenity that you need. The shower was a spa experience itself.
I highly recommend this hotel.
